text.description:
Company: Google India Pvt. Ltd.  
Position: Software Engineering Intern – Summer 2025  
Location: Bangalore, India  
Duration: 12 weeks (May to August)  
Stipend: Competitive

Responsibilities:
- Work on scalable backend systems and cloud infrastructure.
- Collaborate with product and design teams.
- Write clean and maintainable code with documentation.

Requirements:
✔ Currently pursuing B.Tech/M.Tech in CS or related field.  
✔ Strong foundation in Data Structures and Algorithms.  
✔ Experience with Python/Java and web technologies.

How to Apply:
➡ Apply via our official careers page: [https://careers.google.com](https://careers.google.com)  
Deadline: August 15, 2025

text.description:
🎉 Congratulations!

You have been selected for a **Virtual Internship** at TechVision Pvt. Ltd. as a Data Science Intern. This is a work-from-home opportunity with flexible hours. No interview or technical test required!

🔹 Stipend: ₹15,000/month  
🔹 Duration: 3 months  
🔹 Perks: Certificate, LOR, and PPO  
🔹 You must pay a refundable ₹999 registration fee to confirm your spot.  

Please pay via UPI to: techvision123@upi  
Reply “YES” to confirm your seat. Limited slots available!
